tool_description: An API that brings you the latest coronavirus news from the best news sources around the world.
name: Covid News Update
title: Covid News Update

api_list.name: Get News From Particular Source
api_list.description: This endpoint will get coronavirus news from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news-update.p.rapidapi.com/news/forbes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news-update.p.rapidapi.com/news/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Covid-19 News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return coronavirus news from multiple sources all over the world.
